glc

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x58

Description

Global Controller Register Space

Contents

Offset Identifier Name
0x00 test Test Register
0x04 global_reset Global Reset Counter
0x08 cgra_stall CGRA stall
0x0C glb_clk_en_master GLB clock enable
0x10 glb_clk_en_bank_master GLB clock enable
0x14 glb_pcfg_broadcast_stall GLB Stall
0x18 stream_start_pulse Stream Start
0x1C pc_start_pulse Parallel Config Start
0x20 strm_f2g_ier Stream From CGRA to GLB Interrupt Enable Register
0x24 strm_g2f_ier Stream From GLB to CGRA Interrupt Enable Register
0x28 par_cfg_g2f_ier Parallel Configuration From CGRA to GLB Interrupt Enable Register
0x2C global_ier Global Interrupt Enable Register
0x30 strm_f2g_isr Stream From CGRA to GLB Interrupt Status Register
0x34 strm_g2f_isr Stream From GLB to CGRA Interrupt Status Register
0x38 par_cfg_g2f_isr Parallel Configuration From CGRA to GLB Interrupt Status Register
0x3C global_isr Global Interrupt Status Register
0x40 cgra_config CGRA Configuration Register File
0x54 glb_flush_crossbar GLB flush crossbar
